Chinenye "Chiney" Ogwumike bụ onye (amụrụ na Machị 21, 1992) bụ onye Naijiria-Amerịka ọkachamara na-agba bọọlụ maka Los Angeles Sparks nke Women's National Basketball Association (WNBA)
Ka ọ na-erule 2020, ọ ghọrọ nwanyị ojii mbụ na-akwado ihe ngosi redio mba maka ESPN, bụrụkwa onye egwuregwu WNBA mbụ mere ya
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-akọwa ihe mbụ na ndị na-eto eto a kpọrọ aha onye nyocha NBA maka netwọk na-ekpuchi NBA, WNBA, na egwuregwu dịgasị iche iche, mgbe ọ na-egwu na WNBA n'otu oge
Chiney bụ onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Stanford, ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na mmekọrịta mba ụwa

Ọ gbara bọọlụ n'egwuregwu Final Fours atọ ma mechie dị ka onye ndú nnọkọ na ịgba goolu na rebounding ka ọ na-erule Jenụwarị mkpụrụ ụbọchị atọ, 2014. Ka ọ na-erule n'afọ 2016, a họpụtara Ogwumike ka ọ bụrụ osote onye isi oche nke WNBA Players Association, ma bịanye aka na nkwekọrịta nkwado na Adidas. Na Mee 2018, Ogwumike bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ọtụtụ afọ na ESPN iji bụrụ onye nyocha basketball oge niile.

A mụrụ ya na Tomball, Texas, Ogwumike gara Cypress Fairbanks High School na Cypress dị nso, Texas, merie 5A State Championship na oge nke abụọ na oge ndị okenye. A kpọrọ Ogwumike WBCA na McDonald's All-American
O sonyere na 2010 WBCA High School All-America Game, ebe o nwetara akara iri abụọ na anọ , ma nweta nsọpụrụ MVP maka ndị otu White.
Ogwumike họọrọ Stanford karịa Connecticut na Notre Dame, sonyeere nwanne ya nwanyị Nneka Ogwumike.
Ogwumike kwụsịrị ọrụ Stanford ya na 2014 dị ka onye ndu na-agba ọsọ oge niile maka nwoke na nwanyị ọ bụla na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Pac-12, ndekọ nke dara na 2016 na Kelsey Plum nke Washington.
A kpọrọ Ogwumike aha na otu USA Basketball U18

Ndị otu USA bụ otu n'ime ndị otu asatọ si North, South na Central America, tinyere Caribbean, kpọrọ ka ha sonye na 2010 FIBA Americas U18 Championship For Women, nke emere na US Olympic Training Center, na Colorado Springs, Colorado
Jennifer Rizzotti zụrụ ndị otu ahụ
Ogwumike malitere egwuregwu ise niile ma bụrụ onye na-ebute akara na 13.2 n'egwuregwu ọ bụla
Ọ bụkwa onye na-ebute ụzọ na 7.4 rebounds kwa egwuregwu
Ndị otu USA meriri egwuregwu ise niile wee nweta ihe nrite ọla edo.
Usoro a na-ahụkarị bụ maka ndị egwuregwu nọ na otu U18 ịkwaga na otu U19
Otú ọ dị
Ogwumike gbara nke ọma dị ka U18 nke na a kwalitere ya na otu World University Games maka 2011 World University Games nke emere na Shenzhen, China
Chiney abụghị naanị Ogwumike nọ n'òtù ahụ, dịka nwanne ya nwanyị, Nneka Ogwumike, nọkwa n'òtle ahụ
Ha abụọ malitere egwuregwu ọ bụla, na Chiney na-enweta ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ akara iri n'egwuregwu ọ bụla
Ọ gbara iri abụọ na ise n'ime iri atọ na asaa ịgba égbè maka otu na-eduga 67.6% ịgba égbè
O nyeere USA aka imeri egwuregwu isii niile ma nweta ihe nrite ọla edo.

N'afọ 2014 na Europe, Ogwumike gbara bọọlụ na Ịtali maka Famila Schio. N'oge oge WNBA nke afọ 2016, Ogwumike bịanyere aka na Henan Phoenix nke WCBA maka oge China nke afọ 2016 na afọ 17. N'egwuregwu nke ise ya na ndị otu ahụ, Ogwumike nwetara akara iri ise na isii (na 23 nke 24 field goal shooting) yana 12 rebounds Ọ ga-emecha merie MVP nke mbụ, na-enweta akara 33.6 kwa egwuregwu na 12.4 rebounds kwa egwuregwu, tupu mmerụ ahụ achilles ya.
Ogwumike bụ onye mbụ e dere n'ozuzu ya na 2014 WNBA draft site na Connecticut Sun
N'oge ọhụrụ ya, Ogwumike ghọrọ onye mbido, na-enweta akara 15.5 dị elu n'egwuregwu ọ bụla na 7.5 rebounds kwa egwuregwu
A kpọrọ ya WNBA All-Star ya na nwanne ya nwanyị Nneka Ogwumike, na-aghọ ụmụnne nwanyị abụọ mbụ a họpụtara n'egwuregwu WNBA All. Ogwumike ga-emeri WNBA Rookie of the Year Award na 2014.
Ogwumike nọdụrụ n'oge niile nke afọ 2015 ka ọ na-agbake site na micro-fracture na ikpere aka nri ya nke ọ nwere ọtụtụ ọnwa tupu oge ahụ.
Ogwumike laghachiri n'ụzọ dị mma maka oge 2016, na-egwu egwuregwu iri atọ na atọ na iri na asatọ na-amalite mgbe ọ na-enweta akara 12.6 kwa egwuregwu

O nwetara akara 26 kachasị elu na 15 rebounds na mmeri egwuregwu oge niile megide Dallas Wings. N'ọnwa Disemba 2016, a mara ọkwa na a wara Ogwumike ahụ mgbe ọ merụrụ ahụ mgbe ọ na-egwuri egwu na mba ofesi na China n'oge WNBA offseason. E wepụrụ ya na oge mgbake nke ọnwa isii na itoolu, nke mere ka ọ hapụ oge WNBA nke afọ 2017.
N'ọnwa Eprel 2017, Sun kwụsịtụrụ Ogwumike maka oge niile nke afọ 2017 iji wepụta ebe a na-edepụta aha n'ihi mmerụ ahụ ya na n'otu ọnwa ahụ, ọ bịanyekwara aka na nkwekọrịta nkwekọrịta.
Na ụbọchị iri na abụọ n'ọnwa Mee , 2018, Ogwumike laghachiri na Sun na oge izizi ha, na-egwu egwuregwu WNBA mbụ ya n'ime afọ abụọ

N'ime nkeji iri na asaa nke egwuregwu, o nwetara akara itoolu na mmalite na mmeri 101 na 65 na Las Vegas Aces. N'abalị iri atọ n'ọnwa Juun afọ 2018, Ogwumike nwetara akara ọhụrụ dị elu nke akara iri atọ na mmeri 103 na Seattle Storm. Ka e mesịrị na oge 2018, a mara ọkwa na a họpụtara Ogwumike n'ime 2018 WNBA All-Star Game, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ nke abụọ ya. Sun mechiri dị ka mkpụrụ nke anọ na league na ndekọ 21 z13, na-enweta bye na egwuregwu nke abụọ
Sun ga-efunahụ Phoenix Mercury na 9686.

N'ụbọchị iri abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa April  2019, e rere Ogwumike na Los Angeles Sparks maka nhọrọ nke mbụ nke afọ 2020, na-eweghachi ya na nwanne ya nwanyị Nneka. Sparks mechiri dị ka mkpụrụ nke atọ na ndekọ 22-12, na-enweta bye na agba nke abụọ
N'egwuregwu nke abụọ, Sparks meriri onye na-agbachitere Seattle Storm 92-69
Na ọkara ikpeazụ, ndị otu mbụ ya, Connecticut Sun, wepụrụ Sparks na egwuregwu atọ.

Na June 2020, Ogwumike kwupụtara na ọ ga-anọdụ ala na oge WNBA nke 2020 n'ihi nchegbu ahụike nke igwu egwu na bubble n'oge ọrịa COVID-19. Na-enweghị Ogwumike, Sparks mechiri oge 15-7 dị ka mkpụrụ nke atọ na-aga na agba nke abụọ mana Connecticut Sun ga-ewepụ ya na egwuregwu mmeri.
Na Febụwarị 2021, Ogwumike bịanyere aka na Sparks maka nkwekọrịta ọtụtụ afọ.
Na Mee 2018, Ogwumike bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ọtụtụ afọ na ESPN iji bụrụ onye nyocha basketball oge niile
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2020, ọ ghọrọ nwanyị ojii mbụ na-akwado ihe ngosi redio mba maka ESPN, ebe ọ ghọkwara onye egwuregwu WNBA mbụ mere ya
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-akọwa ihe kachasị ọhụrụ a ga-akpọ onye nyocha NBA oge niile maka ESPN, mgbe ọ na-egwu na WNBA n'otu oge

Ogwumike na Mike Golic Jr., jikọrọ aka, dị ka onye na-akwado ihe ngosi redio ESPN Chiney & Golic Jr.. Mgbe a haziri ihe nkiri NBA nke ESPN, ọ sonyeere usoro NBA Today kwa ụbọchị dị ka onye nyocha na-agbanwe agbanwe na studio.
